remarks: Double orthocomplement for ` DVecH ` vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Jul-2014.)
statement:
doch2val2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
doch2val2.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
doch2val2.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
doch2val2.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
doch2val2.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
doch2val2.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
doch2val2.x $e |- ( ph -> X C_ V ) $.
doch2val2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` X ) ) = |^| { z e. ran I | X C_ z } ) $.
$d H z $.
$d I z $.
$d K z $.
$d V z $.
$d W z $.
$d X z $.
